    /**
 * The ASTs of the Egg Lang 
 * @external Grammar
 * @see {@link https://ull-esit-pl-2122.github.io/temas/syntax-analysis/ast.html#gramatica-informal-de-los-arboles-del-parser-de-egg}
 */

/**
 * @desc Helper for an Egg language parser. Builds a node related to an Apply token.
 * @param {Array} data Contains the information related to the token.
 * @returns An AST Node for the Egg language.
 */
function buildApply(data) {
  console.log("apply: ", data);
  if (data[1] === null) return buildWord(data[0]);
  return {
    type: "apply",
    operator: buildWord(data[0]),
    args: data[1]
  };
}

/**
 * @desc Helper for an Egg language parser. Builds a node related to an Word token.
 * @param {Object} data Contains the information related to the token.
 * @returns An AST Node for the Egg language.
 */
function buildWord(data) {
  console.log("word: ", data);
  return {
    type: "word",
    offset: data.offset,
    lineBreaks: data.lineBreaks,
    line: data.line,
    col: data.col,
    name: data.value
  }
}

/**
 * @desc Helper for an Egg language parser. Builds a node related to an Value token.
 * @param {Object} data Contains the information related to the token.
 * @returns An AST Node for the Egg language.
 */
function buildValue(data) {
  console.log("value: ", data);
  return {
    type: "value",
    value: data.value,
    raw: data.text
  };
}

module.exports = { buildApply, buildWord, buildValue };
